title: EPDG T-206 for Sale Prices Reduced Scans Added

posts.post_title: EPDG T-206 for Sale Prices Reduced Scans Added
posts.post_content:
I have the following EPDG Back White Sox:
 
Lee Tannehill (L. Tannehill on front) SGC A - missing a bit of the top edge. Image still looks great; no creasing, slight stain in corner on back. SOLD

Doc White (pitching) SGC 10 - slight paper loss on front along a crease, back clean, great color image very attractive $35

Fred Payne PSA 3 - Clean image front and back; slight scuffing on lower right corner. Nice card. SOLD

PM or email with "I'll take it" and its yours.
Check or Money Order preferred.
RayB

Scans added and prices reduced again.
Thanks.
RayB

First "I'll take it" gets them.
Thanks.
RayB
I'll take Payne.  PM sent.  Thanks.
